resources.string: File access is required to extract sort tag from music files.
Processing file %1$d/%2$d. %3$d files failed to load, %4$d missing titles, %5$d missing artists, %6$d missing albums.
Processed all %2$d files. %3$d files failed to load, %4$d missing titles, %5$d missing artists, %6$d missing albums.
Extract sort order key of title, artist and album from music files and apply to Android Media Storage database. Root permission and external storage access required.
